anticipated_qopcs:
{
  "pains": [
    "How can Whatfix help Infosys achieve digital transformation and business outcomes?",
    "What are the implementation and integration costs of Whatfix with our existing software applications?",
    "How can Whatfix enhance employee productivity and user adoption of our software applications?",
    "What is the ROI of investing in a digital adoption platform like Whatfix?",
    "How does Whatfix address the challenges of managing a large workforce and staying ahead in the competitive IT services market?",
    "Can Whatfix provide customized solutions for our specific industry and business needs?",
    "How does Whatfix compare to competitors like WalkMe, Pendo, and Appcues in terms of features, pricing, and implementation?",
    "What kind of support and training does Whatfix offer to ensure successful adoption and utilization of the platform?",
    "How can Whatfix help us measure and track the success of our digital transformation initiatives?",
    "What are the security and data privacy measures in place to protect our sensitive business data?"
  ],
  "objections": [
    "We have already invested heavily in training and support programs, how can Whatfix provide additional value?",
    "We are not sure if Whatfix is scalable for our large and complex organization",
    "Whatfix may require significant changes to our existing workflows and processes, can we justify the investment?",
    "We are concerned about the cost and ROI of Whatfix, can you provide case studies or references?",
    "We have had negative experiences with similar digital adoption platforms in the past, how is Whatfix different?",
    "We are not convinced that Whatfix can address our specific pain points and challenges",
    "Whatfix may not be compatible with our existing technology stack, can you provide integration support?",
    "We are unsure about the level of customization and flexibility Whatfix offers for our specific business needs",
    "We need to prioritize other business initiatives and do not have the bandwidth to implement Whatfix right now"
  ]
}
